review_blob: 22 oz. Bomber.  Poured a dark chocolate color with no head retention. Aroma of chocolate and chipotle.  First sip was intriguing with hints of chocolate, cinnamon and smoke then came the heat to the back of the throat.  Not very hot but noticeable.  This is a light sipper with many friends sharing one bottle.  More interesting than good.
beer_name: Elysian 12 Beers of Apocalypse # 4 - Peste Chocolate Chili Ale

review_blob: Light aroma, nice copper color, balanced hop taste with a slight "English" finish.  Good drinkability
This was a fine Black I P A.  Aroma was citrusy, head retention was good, smooth hoppy aroma.  Taste was slightly weak for an Imperial.  Overall decent drinkability.
